1.title: Pressure
1.plot: Top PR executive Alex Kane receives juicy info that may help her win the coveted Mertel Industries account. But will the technological shortcomings of her new assistant, Emily, get in the way?

2.title: The Truth About Tracy Rose
2.plot: Emily's roommate, Casey, makes it her mission to rid Emily of her antiquated practices of dial-up and pen-pal writing with an actual pen. But does all this quick access to information really make everything better?

3.title: Competition
3.plot: Alex sits down with a rival's client and reveals some devastating news. Furthermore, a struggle to balance her professional and personal life puts the corporate mogul in a bind.

4.title: The Missing Godiva
4.plot: Alex begins her work day with a grave tragedy, her cell phone is lost. But, as if matters couldn't be worse, Justin feels neglected. Also, a captivating presentation from her associates, Edward and Calvin, awaits her in the conference room.

5.title: Connection Failure
5.plot: Alex tries to make things up to Justin, but will there be a failure to connect? Emily receives some startling information that will impact the product launch.

6.title: Emily Vs. Facebook
6.plot: Emily has to deal with a battle that any girl would tussle with...when will my crush accept my friend request? Casey thinks that Emily should expand her options & make a profile for online dating. Will Emily buy into it?

7.title: Damage Control
7.plot: Alex attempts to control the damage from Sheffler's resignation as Emily contemplates her future at Plush. Danielle is hiding something.

8.title: Revelation
8.plot: Alex is presented with the first real look of promoting Mertel's ThinkLink device. But, while her team focuses on the campaign, she must seek out a mysterious whistle blower with information that could derail the entire project.

9.title: The Disconnect
9.plot: It turns out Brian is not who Emily thought he was and Justin doesn't like what he sees in Alex. But, Alex is not going down without a fight. As Alex is trying to get through to Justin...uh-oh did the power just go out?

10.title: 2010 A.F.
10.plot: Alex and Emily deal with the initial fallout from the network collapse as they find themselves in a new era - 2010 A.F.

11.title: No Trace
11.plot: There is no trace of any working electronic device. Worst of all, Alex has no trace of the conversation between her & Sheffler that predicted this terrible "collapse." Also, Justin sees no trace of the woman he proposed to.

12.title: Square One
12.plot:

 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: Alex Kane, a rising publicist at Plush PR, recently won a new account that is on the verge of launching a revolutionary product. This product will change the terrain of technology as we know it. Emily Stevens, Alex's new assistant, is completely clueless and finds herself out of place in the chaotic publicity industry. Alex finds herself in a constant bind as she juggles her time consuming career with her neglected fiancé. Will she be able to pull off a successful launch as she is pulled in different directions by her career, personal life and naive assistant?
imdb.title: Square One
plot: In the modern day surrounded by tweets, status updates, mobile email and the need to be constantly connected, how will relationships be impacted by the ever increasing digital lifestyle?::bpatel
